Alice Kile

Frontend Engineer

Alice Kile is a Frontend Engineer with years of experience building enterprise-grade web applications. She has a passion for the intersection of design, interface and product ideas. Apart from her day job, Alice also runs her own website jsandfriends.dev in her free time where she posts about web development, design and other related ideas.
